# Focused Scrutiny (Spell)
## Overview
[[Divination Spells|Divination]]

**Level:** [[2nd Level Alchemist Spells|Alchemist 2]], [[2nd Level Bard Spells|Bard 2]], [[2nd Level Inquisitor Spells|Inquisitor 2]], [[2nd Level Shaman Spells|Shaman 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 4th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 4]], [[BoXM 4th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 4]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** You

**Duration:** 10 minutes/level (D)

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Advanced Class Guide, pg. 182

You gain heightened sensitivity to the mannerisms, reactions, and body language of one creature you can perceive, allowing you to sense its state of mind and easily influence it. You gain a +10 bonus on [[Perception (Skill)|Perception]], [[Sense Motive (Skill)|Sense Motive]], and [[Survival (Skill)|Survival]] checks attempted against the target creature, as well as a +5 bonus on [[Diplomacy (Skill)|Diplomacy]] and [[Intimidate (Skill)|Intimidate]] checks attempted against it.
